metadata.title: Privacy Policy - EventMaple
metadata.description: EventMaple Privacy and Data Protection Policy

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.alert: Your privacy is important to us. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use EventMaple.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.text1: EventMaple is a personal project developed with the aim of facilitating event and agenda management. This Privacy Policy explains what personal information we collect, how we use it, how we protect it, and what your rights are regarding it.
introduction.text2: By using our service, you accept the practices described in this policy. If you do not agree with these practices, please do not use EventMaple.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.intro: We only collect the information necessary to provide and improve our service. This information includes:

account.title: 2.1. Account Information
items: Full name: To personalize your experience and show you as a registered user
Email address: To create your account, authentication, important communications, and password recovery
Encrypted password: Stored securely using hashing to protect your account

usage.title: 2.2. Service Usage Data
items: Registered events: List of events you have registered for or shown interest in
Bookmarked talks: Sessions, workshops, or specific talks you have marked as favorites or of interest
Agenda preferences: Your personal configuration for viewing and organizing events
Activity dates: Record of when you register for events or modify your agenda

technical.title: 2.3. Basic Technical Information
items: Session data: Information necessary to keep your session active securely
Browser and device type: To optimize the user experience
technical.note: Note: We do not use tracking cookies or third-party analytics tools.

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.intro: We use the collected information exclusively for the following purposes:

operation.title: Service Operation
items: Create and manage your account
Authenticate your access
Process your event registrations
Save your preferences

communications.title: Communications
items: Registration confirmations
Password recovery
Event notifications
Important updates

improvement.title: Service Improvement
items: Understand usage patterns
Optimize features
Fix technical issues
Develop new features

security.title: Security
items: Prevent unauthorized use
Detect suspicious activity
Protect your account
Comply with legal obligations

usage.commitment: Commitment: We NEVER sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for commercial or marketing purposes.

storage.title: 4. Data Storage and Security
storage.intro: The security of your information is a priority for us. We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data:

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.text: All passwords are stored using secure hashing algorithms. Connections to our platform use HTTPS.

infrastructure.title: Secure Infrastructure
infrastructure.text: We use reliable hosting services (Supabase) that comply with industry security standards.

access.title: Restricted Access
access.text: Access to data is limited and protected. Only the project administrator has access for maintenance and technical support.

minimization.title: Data Minimization
minimization.text: We only collect and store information strictly necessary for the operation of the service.

storage.important: Important: No method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

sharing.title: 5. Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.intro: EventMaple does not share your personal information with third parties, except in the following limited circumstances:
items: Service providers: We use Supabase as a backend and authentication provider. These providers have access to your information only to perform tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for other purposes.
Legal requirements: If required by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.
Rights protection: To protect and defend our rights or property, investigate potential violations, or protect user safety.
sharing.guarantee: Guarantee: We NEVER sell your personal information. We NEVER use your data for targeted advertising. We NEVER share your information with third parties for marketing.

retention.title: 6. Data Retention
retention.intro: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
items: Active account data: Kept while your account is active and you use the service
Data after account deletion: Permanently deleted within 30 days of the deletion request
Backups: May be kept temporarily in backup systems but will be deleted in the next cleanup cycle

rights.title: 7. Your Privacy Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

access.title: ✓ Right of Access
access.desc: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you

deletion.title: ✓ Right to Erasure
deletion.desc: Request the deletion of your personal data

portability.title: ✓ Right to Portability
portability.desc: Receive your data in a structured and readable format

rights.contact: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us via the means indicated at the end of this policy.

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.intro: EventMaple uses essential cookies solely for the basic operation of the service:
items: Session cookies: Necessary to keep your session active and ensure you remain authenticated while browsing
Authentication cookies: To securely verify your identity
cookies.notUsed: We do not use: Tracking cookies, advertising cookies, third-party analytics tools (like Google Analytics), or tracking pixels.

minors.title: 9. Privacy of Minors
minors.text1: EventMaple is not directed to children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16.
minors.text2: If you are a parent or guardian and discover that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately so we can remove it from our systems.

changes.title: 10. Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.text1: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "last updated" date.
changes.text2: We recommend reviewing this Policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information. Changes are effective when posted on this page.

international.title: 11. International Transfers
international.text1: Your information may be transferred to and maintained on servers located outside your country of residence. These servers may be in countries with data protection laws different from those of your jurisdiction.
international.text2: By using EventMaple, you consent to the transfer of your information to these servers. We ensure that our service providers comply with adequate data protection standards.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have questions, concerns, or requests about this Privacy Policy or the handling of your personal data, do not hesitate to contact us:
contact.response: We will respond to your request as soon as possible, generally within 7 business days.

commitment.title: Our Commitment to Your Privacy
commitment.text: At EventMaple, we understand that your trust is fundamental. We are committed to being transparent about how we handle your data, protecting your information with the best available security practices, and respecting your privacy rights at all times. Your privacy is non-negotiable.

metadata.title: Terms and Conditions - EventMaple
metadata.description: Terms and conditions of use for EventMaple

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text1: By accessing and using EventMaple (hereinafter, "the Platform" or "the Service"), you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.
acceptance.text2: EventMaple is a personal non-commercial project that provides tools for event and agenda management free of charge.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.intro: EventMaple is a digital platform that allows users to:
items: Create and manage their user profile
Explore and view available events
Register for events of interest
Mark and manage specific talks or sessions within events
Create and personalize their personal event agenda
description.text: The service is provided "as is" and may be subject to modifications, improvements, or interruptions without prior notice.

account.title: 3. Registration and User Account
account.intro: To use certain features of the Platform, you must create an account by providing accurate and complete information. You agree to:
items: Provide true, current, and complete information during the registration process
Maintain and update your registration information to keep it true, current, and complete
Maintain the confidentiality of your password and be responsible for all activities that occur under your account
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account
account.text: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if the information provided is incorrect, inaccurate, or incomplete.

data.title: 4. Data Collection, Use and Communications
data.intro: By using EventMaple, you accept that we collect and process the following personal data:
items: Account information: Full name and email address
Event data: Information about events you register for
Agenda preferences: Talks and sessions you mark as favorites or of interest
data.usageIntro: These data are used exclusively to:
usageItems: Send notifications related to events and service updates
Personalize your experience on the Platform
data.communications: Communications Consent: The user expressly accepts to receive emails to the provided address informing about new platform updates, available events, satisfaction surveys, or relevant service news. You can unsubscribe from these communications at any time.
data.privacyLink: For more information on how we handle your data, consult our <link>Privacy Policy</link>.

conduct.title: 5. User Conduct
conduct.intro: You agree to use the Platform only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. It is prohibited to:
items: Use the Service in a way that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair the Platform
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the Platform
Use the Service to transmit illegal, offensive, or inappropriate content
Interfere with the use and enjoyment of the Platform by other users
Use bots, scrapers, or other automated tools without authorization
Copy, reproduce, or distribute content from the Platform without permission

ip.title: 6. Intellectual Property
ip.text1: All content on the Platform, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, and data compilations, is the property of EventMaple or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws.
ip.text2: Information about specific events may be property of the respective organizers and is shown for informational purposes.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.intro: EventMaple is provided as a personal project without warranties of any kind. To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law:
items: We do not guarantee that the Service will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free
We are not responsible for the accuracy or currency of event information provided by third parties
We shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use the Service
We do not guarantee that listed events will take place as scheduled
liability.text: The user is responsible for verifying directly with event organizers any critical information before making decisions based on the information shown on the Platform.

modifications.title: 8. Service Modifications
modifications.text1: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue the Service (or any part thereof) at any time, with or without prior notice. We shall not be liable to you or third parties for any modification, suspension, or interruption of the Service.
modifications.text2: As a personal project, EventMaple may experience periods of downtime or significant changes in functionality without prior notice.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.text1: We may terminate or suspend your access to the Platform immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including without limitation if you breach these Terms.
termination.text2: You may close your account at any time by contacting us or deleting your profile from your account settings. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will cease immediately.

law.title: 10. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
law.text1: These Terms shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with applicable laws, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
law.text2: Any dispute related to these Terms or the use of the Platform shall be resolved through good faith negotiation between the parties.

changes.title: 11. Changes to Terms
changes.text1: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. When we make changes, we will update the "last updated" date at the top of this page.
changes.text2: Your continued use of the Platform after any change constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms. We recommend reviewing these Terms periodically to stay informed of any updates.

contact.title: 12. Contact Information
contact.intro: If you have questions, comments, or concerns about these Terms and Conditions, you can contact us via:

footer.text: Thank you for using EventMaple. We hope our platform helps you manage and enjoy your events more efficiently.
